titleStmt.title: A true copie of a letter sent from a friend in Paris, to his friend in London, with one inclosed, casually found neer the Louvre in Paris.
titleStmt.author: Poloeconomicus.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Decemb. 26. 1656. O. P.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
